attributes.action: introduce mandatory free-phone numbers for GPs and NHS Direct
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
the ambulance service is stretched to the limit in some regions and some of this can be put down to people calling 999 because "i've got no credit on my phone"

if all GP surgeries had free-phone numbers this would no doubt relieve some of the pressures on Ambulance Services (and improve response times), especially as many patients end up being referred to GPs by crews
